title: Slew of measures expected in Budget to promote investments in clean energy sector: Experts
description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will present the 2024-25 Budget on July 23, targeting renewable energy investments through policy changes, VGF, and incentives. Areas of focus include green growth, storage projects, battery storage, and tax issues. Ashwin Jacob from Deloitte highlights the significance of addressing indirect taxes for Green Hydrogen and refund of input GST for electricity supplied to GH units.
